metadata.author: Wayfarer Core
metadata.description: Core observation scenes for Brass Bell Inn and Town Square tutorial area

observationScenes.name: Study the Common Room
observationScenes.description: Carefully observe the inn's common room and its occupants.

examinationPoints.title: Watch Elena's movements
examinationPoints.description: The innkeeper moves with practiced efficiency, but her eyes linger on certain customers longer than others.

examinationPoints.title: Glance at the guest ledger
examinationPoints.description: The ledger sits open on the counter. Recent entries show several merchants, a few laborers, and one name with a question mark beside it.

examinationPoints.title: Listen to nearby conversations
examinationPoints.description: Patrons speak in low tones about supply shortages and delayed caravans. One mentions bandits on the eastern road, but another dismisses it as rumor.

examinationPoints.title: Note the upstairs hallway
examinationPoints.description: The stairs lead to the guest rooms. One door has a makeshift lock - recently installed and crude. Someone wanted extra security.

examinationPoints.title: Observe Thomas's behavior
examinationPoints.description: The foreman keeps checking the door as if expecting someone. He's worried, but trying to hide it. Whatever he's waiting for isn't coming.

observationScenes.name: Survey the Town Square
observationScenes.description: Get your bearings by studying the central square and its connections.

examinationPoints.title: Identify the major roads
examinationPoints.description: Three main roads connect here: north to the merchant district, east toward farms, south to the lower wards. The eastern road looks less traveled than it should.

examinationPoints.title: Watch the flow of people
examinationPoints.description: Most traffic moves north-south. Very few come from the east. Those who do seem in a hurry and don't linger.

examinationPoints.title: Examine the merchant stalls
examinationPoints.description: Several stalls display goods, but one - a grain merchant's post - stands empty with a weathered 'Closed' sign. Dust suggests it's been days.

examinationPoints.title: Study the eastern road entrance
examinationPoints.description: Fresh wagon tracks lead east, but none return. Someone left recently, but the road seems to have swallowed them.

examinationPoints.title: Notice the guard post
examinationPoints.description: A small guard post overlooks the square. The guard on duty looks bored but alert. This town takes security seriously.

observationScenes.name: Investigate Grain Shortage Evidence
observationScenes.description: Search for concrete evidence about the missing grain delivery.

examinationPoints.title: Thoroughly examine the closed grain stall
examinationPoints.description: Behind the counter, you find a delivery schedule. The last entry is dated five days ago with a note: 'Meeting supplier at eastern crossroads, morning.'

examinationPoints.title: Search for witnesses to the departure
examinationPoints.description: You ask around discreetly. A stable hand remembers the grain merchant leaving with two wagons. 'Seemed confident,' he says. 'Like he'd done it a hundred times.'

examinationPoints.title: Consult the guards about eastern road safety
examinationPoints.description: The guard shrugs. 'Road's been quiet. No bandit reports, no incidents. If something happened, it happened without witnesses - or survivors to report it.'

examinationPoints.title: Study the wagon tracks more closely
examinationPoints.description: The tracks head east, deep and steady under load. But there's something odd - a third set of lighter tracks follows the same path, fresher than the others.

observationScenes.name: Late Night Inn Investigation
observationScenes.description: Investigate the inn when most guests are asleep.

examinationPoints.title: Listen at the secured door
examinationPoints.description: You press your ear to the door. Silence. But there's a faint smell - old leather and road dust. Whoever stays here travels frequently.

examinationPoints.title: Watch Elena's reaction to the room
examinationPoints.description: You casually mention the secured room. Elena's expression doesn't change, but her hands pause for just a moment. 'Some guests value privacy,' she says evenly.

examinationPoints.title: Search the ledger for the mystery guest
examinationPoints.description: When Elena steps away, you check the ledger. The name beside the question mark is 'Corvus.' No surname, no business listed. Paid for a full week in advance.

examinationPoints.title: Examine boot prints near the secured room
examinationPoints.description: Fresh mud tracks lead to and from the room. The pattern matches riding boots - expensive ones. This guest has money and a horse.
